jobDescription: Thank you for visiting or job portal. If you would like to be considered for a future opportunity, please submit your resume, cover letter, along with any pdf, video reel, with access to view samples of your work, if applicable.If you’re inquiring about a 2017 internship, unfortunately, Serino Coyne will not be hosting an internship program this year, but you may still submit your profile details and we’ll consider you for our next summer internship program, hopefully in 2018Thank you,The HR Teamjobs@serinocoyne.com
